article_title: Jon Stewart Looks At 'Doing Weird S#!T To Obamacare'
article_text:
Seems like the latest trend in Republican political ads involves candidates shooting at laws they don't like -- especially Obamacare.

On Thursday night's "The Daily Show," Jon Stewart looks at the rising violence in these ads and offers a frightening and hilarious glimpse at where they might be going in the future, with Jason Jones giving Obamacare the "Reservoir Dogs" treatment.
